Beneficiary Responds
Use the table below to determine what action to take once the beneficiary responds.

lower level of income with acceptable supporting evidence or confirms the match income

higher level of income
beneficiary's evidence and/or report.
lower level of income not resulting in termination, and
does not provide supporting evidence
FTI and send a notice of proposed adverse action letter.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
